short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome extension to assist with Zendesk communication rephrasing

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto FAB Rephrase Kansha is a Chrome extension designed to enhance Zendesk by adding a floating action button (FAB) that allows users to quickly send text from editable fields to a rephraser API and retrieve rephrased content. This tool is specifically targeted for customer support agents to help streamline the process of responding to queries.
